archimate:Requirement.name: SG.2.1.2a: a) how information security will add value to the organisation (e.g. in terms of reduced cost and enhanced reputation) and protect the interests of stakeholders
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
